rows.label: qst700703_msg0001
rows.name:
Excuse me, are you Bry-san?
Nittle-san's asked us to come tell you
to start repairs on the garden...

rows.label: qst700703_msg0002
rows.name:
Sorry, we're closed for business.
Go away.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes! Yes, it has! And it's all because of
my knucklehead son!

rows.label: qst700703_msg0005
rows.name:
He's meant to be bringing me sand,
not loafing around somewhere!

rows.label: qst700703_msg0006
rows.name:
...Sand? So you've sent your son
to fetch sand, is that right?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0008
rows.name:
I've told him to be careful, and plenty
of times, too... I wonder what that oaf
is doing...

rows.label: qst700703_msg0009
rows.name:
It certainly sounds like he may have
encountered trouble.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0010
rows.name:
We could look for him, if you'd let us.
Do you have any idea where your son
might be?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0011
rows.name:
If I did, I wouldn't be having such
a hard time!

rows.label: qst700703_msg0012
rows.name:
...But there is a wooded area on the
far side of the hills. Maybe he just
got lost in there by mistake?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0013
rows.name:
If you happen to find him, could you
drag him back here? We need that
sand to get on with the work!
